Package clue.action

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • clue.action.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccuseAction, AvoidSuggestionAction, EndTurnAction, ExtraTurnAction, KickAction, MoveAction, ShowCardAction, ShowCardsAction, StartAction, StartTurnAction, SuggestAction, ThrowAgainAction
    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Player taking an action in the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      ActionType actionType
      Provides access to the type of action being taken.
      Player player
      the Player initiating the Action
      boolean result
      Stores whether or not the execute() method was permitted in the game rules.

      Creates an instance of the Action

      Simulates the action being taken.

      gets the Player object associated with this Action

      • player

        public Player player
        the Player initiating the Action

      • actionType

        public ActionType actionType
        Provides access to the type of action being taken.

      • result

        public boolean result
        Stores whether or not the execute() method was permitted in the game rules.

        Creates an instance of the Action

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        gets the Player object associated with this Action
        Returns:
        the Player taking the action

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Simulates the action being taken. The success of the action is stored in result.
